I — Exile up to one target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Draw two cards.
II — Return all nonland, nonenchantment permanents to their owners’ hands.
III — You may cast a non-Saga spell with mana value 5 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

cards.rules_text: Untap up to X permanents you control during each other player’s untap step, where X is the number of Shrines you control.

Flying
Ward—Discard a card.
You have “Ward—Discard a card.”
At the beginning of your upkeep, your life total becomes equal to your devotion to black. [i](Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)[/i]

Flying
Favored [i](At the beginning of your combat, you may have a nonlegendary creature you control get +1/+1 and become legendary and named “The Champion.”)[/i]
Whenever another legendary nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it has no name, it isn’t legendary, and it is a Zombie.

Deathtouch
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a deathtouch counter on it. If it already had deathtouch, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.
Each opponent separates the creatures they control into two piles. For each opponent, you choose one of their piles. Each opponent sacrifices the creatures in their chosen pile.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Each opponent discards two cards, then mills two cards.
I — Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
II, III — For each opponent that has eight or more cards in their graveyard, exile a card from that player’s graveyard. You may cast cards exiled this way this turn, and mana of any type can be spent to cast cast it.

cards.rules_text: {4}{B}: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each other Shrine you control. Activate only once each turn.
cards.notes: reworked: Was {2}{B}: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of Shrines you control. Activate only once each turn and only during your turn.

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
When Satyr Arsonist enters, destroy up to one target nonbasic land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Flying
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a single creature you control, bless that creature. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may sacrifice it. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of a spell you control, create a token that’s a copy of that creature, except it has haste. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.

Favored [i](At the beginning of your combat, you may have a nonlegendary creature you control get +1/+1 and become legendary and named “The Champion.”)[/i]
Whenever a legendary creature you control attacks, create a tapped and attacking token that’s a copy of that creature, except it’s not legendary and is an enchantment in addition to its other types.

cards.special_text:
I — A God Divided deals 2 damage to each nonenchantment creature.
II — Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
III — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, A God Divided deals damage to any target equal to the sacrificed creature’s power.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. If you control a number of Shrines greater than or equal to that card’s mana value, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

If you would add mana of a color to your mana pool, you may instead add an amount equal to your devotion to that color instead. [i](Each that in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to that.)[/i]

Favored [i](At the beginning of your combat, you may have a nonlegendary creature you control get +1/+1 and become legendary and named “The Champion.”)[/i]
Whenever your Champion attacks, creatures you control with power 4 or greater get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

Vigilance, reach, trample
Ward—Sacrifice a noncreature permanent.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I, II — Siphon the Divine gains “Creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and indestructible and can’t have or gain hexproof and indestructible.”
III — Target creature you control fights up to one target creature.
Exile target player’s graveyard.

cards.rules_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each Shrine you control.

Whenever Claes, Shield of Karda attacks, another target attacking creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
Whenever a planeswalker you control enters, you may exile Claes, then return him to the battlefield transformed with a number of loyalty counters on him equal to the starting loyalty of that planeswalker.
cards.special_text2:
Creatures you control have ward {2}.
[+1]: Scry 2. You may put a loyalty counter on another planeswalker you control.
[-1]: Create a 0/0 white Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Phlage enters or attacks, Phlage deals 2 damage to any target and you draw a card.
{2}{U}{R}: Return Phlage from your graveyard to the battlefield, then put it on the bottom of its owner’s library. Activate only as a sorcery.

When The Smoking Strand enters, you may search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Planeswalkers you control have “[+1]: Draw a card.”

Return any number of creature cards with total mana value less than or equal to twice your devotion to black from your graveyard to the battlefield. [i](Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)[/i]

Whenever Skotha enters or attacks, target player discards a card and you untap all lands you control.
{2}{B}{G}: Return Skotha from your graveyard to the battlefield, then put it on the bottom of its owner’s library. Activate only as a sorcery.

Indestructible
As long as your devotion to red, white and black is less than nine, Karda isn’t a creature.
Whenever you attack, creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. At the end of combat, if Karda dealt combat damage to a player, sacrifice him, then search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Iroas, Honor-Bound and a card named Mogis, Rage-Crowned and put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.special_text:
Koios, Spear of Karda enters with a number of additional loyalty counters on him equal to your devotion to red. [i](He doesn’t count himself.)[/i]
[+1]: Exile the top three cards of your library. You may cast one of them.
[-3]: Koios deals damage to any nonplayer target equal to your devotion to red.
[-X]: Choose up to X target creatures with total mana value X or less. For each creature chosen this way, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it has haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.rules_text:
Reach
If a creature you control would deal combat damage to a permanent or player, you may have it deal damage equal to your devotion to green instead. [i](Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)[/i]

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Each player puts their hand on the bottom of their library in a random order. You draw five cards, then each opponent draws two cards.
[+1]: Untap each land you control.
[-3]: Return up to three target nonland permanents to their owner’s hands.
[-9]: You get an emblem with “Whenever an opponent casts their first spell each turn, gain control of it. You may choose new targets for that spell.”

[+2]: Mill three cards. You gain 3 life.
[+1]: Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It becomes a 2/2 black Zombie creature in addition to its other types.
[-2]: Target opponent sacrifices a permanent with mana value 3 or greater.
[-12]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, you may draw a card.” Then each opponent sacrifices five permanents.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature or Shrine you control gains first strike until end of turn. If you control three or more Shrines, it gains double strike until end of turn instead.
cards.notes: reworked: Was {2}{R/W}{R/W} with ’At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 0/0 white Army creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on it. If you control three or more Shrines, instead create that token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Army you control.’

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control three or more Shrines, they get +2/+1 until end of turn instead.
cards.notes: reworked: Was {3}{G/W} with ’At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. If you control three or more Shrines, create two of those tokens instead.’

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, scry 2 if you control three or more Shrines, then draw a card.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 white Human creature token with haste. At the beginning of your next end step, sacrifice that token unless you control three or more Shrines.
cards.notes: reworked: Was {3}{R/G} with ’At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If you control three or more Shrines, creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn instead.’

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target Shrine you control becomes a creature in addition to its other types with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn. If you control three or more Shrines, it has base power and toughness 6/6 instead.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Shrine to Mogis deals 1 damage to each opponent. If you control three or more Shrines, Shrine to Mogis deals 3 damage to each opponent instead.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature or Shrine gains deathtouch until end of turn. If you control three or more Shrines, other creatures you control also gain deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, each opponent mills two cards. If you control three or more Shrines, scry 2.

cards.rules_text:
Callaphe can’t be blocked by creatures with mana value 4 or greater.
Whenever Callaphe the Mariner deals combat damage to a player, you get an experience counter. Then if you have three or more experience counters, bless target player. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant player
Enchanted player may cast blue spells with mana value less than or equal to their devotion to blue without paying their mana costs. [i](Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Lurking Vyrkolakas attacks, exile target card from a graveyard. If a nonland card was exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If a land card was exiled this way, this creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
cards.notes: reworked: Was 1/1 with lifelink and ’Whenever Lurking Vyrkolakas enters or attacks, target player exiles a card from their graveyard. If a nonland card was exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Lurking Vyrkolakas and you gain 1 life.’

cards.rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Arena Champion attacks, create a Weapon token, then attach it to an attacking creature you control. [i](It’s an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]

At the beginning of combat of your turn, Belief-Belying Beast gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.
Flying
Whenever you attack with exactly two creatures, draw a card. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.

You may cast this spell without paying its mana cost if your devotion to black is four or greater. [i](Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)[/i]
Deathtouch
Whenever Chrolcatos deals combat damage to player, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

As Karda’s Legacy enters, choose Iroas or Mogis.
• Iroas — Whenever you attack, create a 2/1 red Soldier creature token that’s tapped and attacking. 
• Mogis — Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters or dies, Karda’s Legacy deals 1 damage to each opponent.

When Menelaia enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to three target creatures.
Whenever a creature you control with a counter on it becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, that creature gains hexproof and trample until end of turn.

Whenever you cast a creature spell, put X depth counters on Tide’s Ire, where X is that spell’s mana value.
Remove ten depth counters from Tide’s Ire: Create an 8/8 blue Kraken creature token.
Remove thirty depth counters from Tide’s Ire: Create Tromokratis, a legendary 20/20 blue Kraken creature token with trample and hexproof.

Choose one. If your devotion to white is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to blue.
• Counter target spell.
• Target player draws a card.
• Target player gains 4 life.

Choose one. If your devotion to blue is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to black.
• Target player mills eight cards.
• You gain 1 life for each card type among cards in your opponents’ graveyards.
• Draw a card.

Choose one. If your devotion to black is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to red.
• Create two tapped Treasure tokens.
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
• Choose a nonland permanent type. Each opponent sacrifices a permanent of that type.

Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to red.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.
• Klothys’s Judgment deals 3 damage to target player.

Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to white.
• Permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn.
• Create a token that’s a copy of an Aura you control.
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature with power 4 or greater.

Choose one. If your devotion to white is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to black.
• Each opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

Choose one. If your devotion to blue is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to red.
• Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
• Destroy target artifact.

Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to black.
• Create a 1/1 black Snake creature token with deathtouch.
• Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
• Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

Choose one. If your devotion to red is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to white.
• Create four 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
• Opponents can’t cast spells or activate abilities that aren’t mana abilities this turn.

Choose one. If your devotion to green is three or greater, you may choose another. The same is true for devotion to blue.
• Create two tapped tokens that are a copy of a land you control.
• Draw three cards.
• Untap up to three lands you control.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is your devotion to black. [i](Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can’t be blocked.
{5}{U}, Exile Voyage to the Siren Sea from your graveyard or the battlefield: Draw three cards. This ability costs {1} less for each creature you control that dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn.
cards.notes: nerfed: AA was {3}{U}{U}, Exile Voyage to the Siren Sea from your graveyard or the battlefield: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate only as a sorcery and only if two or more creatures you control dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent mills a card.

Favored [i](At the beginning of your combat, you may have a nonlegendary creature you control get +1/+1 and become legendary and named “The Champion.”)[/i]
Whenever Iara, Blessed-Hart attacks, Iara and another target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

The first spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.
The second spell you cast each turn can’t be countered.
Whenever you cast your third spell each turn, draw a card.

Ward—Sacrifice a permanent. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player sacrifices a permanent.)[/i]
Whenever Host of the Neverending Revel enters or attacks, each player sacrifices a nonland, nontoken permanent. For each player who doesn’t, you draw a card.

Haste
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Efimia of the Horse, create a 1/1 white Human creature token if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. If it’s the second time, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. If it’s the third time, creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.

Indestructible

Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

cards.special_text:
Koios, Spear of Karda enters with a number of additional loyalty counters on him equal to your devotion to red. [i](He doesn’t count himself.)[/i]
[+1]: Exile the top three cards of your library. You may cast one of them.
[-3]: Koios deals damage to any nonplayer target equal to your devotion to red.
[-X]: Choose up to X target creatures with total mana value X or less. For each creature chosen this way, create a token that’s a copy of it, except it has haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
